Terms of Use

Effective Date: July 09, 2025

These Terms of Use (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of nley.in (“Website”) operated by [Insert Company Name] (“we,” “us,” or “our”). By accessing or using the Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By using the Website, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old or have the consent of a parent or guardian. If you do not agree with these Terms, do not use the Website.

2. Use of the Website

You agree to use the Website only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not:

  • Violate any applicable laws or regulations.

  • Infringe on the intellectual property rights of others.

  • Engage in harmful activities, such as hacking, spamming, or distributing malware.

3. Intellectual Property

All content on the Website, including text, images, logos, and code, is owned by or licensed to us and protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written consent.

4. User Accounts

If you create an account, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your username and password. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

5. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Website or inability to access it. The Website is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind.

6. Termination

We may suspend or terminate your access to the Website at our discretion, including for violations of these Terms or applicable laws.

7. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Mumbai, India.

8. Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or a notice on the Website. Your continued use of the Website after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

9. Contact Us

For questions about these Terms, contact us at:

  • Email: contact@nley.in

  • Call: +91 9137 39 3378 / +91 9137 39 3383

  • Address: 403, Flora Point Co. Op. Premises Soc. Ltd., Sarojini Naidu Road, Mulund west, Mumbai 400080.
